text:
Toronto, Canada Rails developer http://sprouter.com

We are working on a big launch this summer involving live video. Looking for a rails dev looking to take on a big role. We only have two developers right now and are looking to add a third. You will have a big say in product design and will play with the newest tech out there. Rails 3, HAML, jquery, websockets, redis - all the good stuff. Hit me up: vince@sprouter.com for more info.
